question.title: Room: onCreate override in AppDatabase_Impl$1 fails due to access modifier conflict
question.body:
I'm working on an Android app using Room for local database storage. When building the project, I'm getting an error in the generated file AppDatabase_Impl.java related to the onCreate() method override. This error only began to occur after adding the Android-nRF-Mesh-Library from Nordic.

Dependency I included:

implementation 'no.nordicsemi.android:mesh:3.3.4'

The Error:

C:\Users\User\dart-app_fe\app\build\generated\ap_generated_sources\backendTestDebug\out\com\sciswift\battr_ui\backend\db\AppDatabase_Impl.java:124: error: onValidateSchema(SupportSQLiteDatabase) in <anonymous com.sciswift.battr_ui.backend.db.AppDatabase_Impl$1> cannot override onValidateSchema(SupportSQLiteDatabase) in Delegate
      protected RoomOpenHelper.ValidationResult onValidateSchema(SupportSQLiteDatabase _db) {
                                                ^
  attempting to assign weaker access privileges; was public

Source Code:

public abstract class AppDatabase extends RoomDatabase {
    private static AppDatabase DATABASE;

    //DAO Getters in abstract methods
    public abstract DrillDao getDrillDao();
    public abstract DrillScoreDao getDrillScoreDao();
    public abstract StageDao getStageDao();
    public abstract UserDao getUserDao();

    public static synchronized AppDatabase getInstance(Context context){
        if (DATABASE == null) {
            DATABASE = Room.databaseBuilder(context, AppDatabase.class, "localDatabase36") //TODO: Revert all schemas
                    .enableMultiInstanceInvalidation()
                    .allowMainThreadQueries()
                    //.addMigrations(MIGRATION_1_2)
                    .createFromAsset("database/localDatabase.db")
                    .build();
        }
        return DATABASE;
    }

    static final Migration MIGRATION_1_2 = new Migration(1, 2) {
        @Override
        public void migrate(SupportSQLiteDatabase database) {
            // Since we didn't alter the table, there's nothing else to do here.
        }
    };
}

Below is my build.gradle file

plugins {
    id 'com.android.application'
}

apply plugin: 'androidx.navigation.safeargs'

android {
    compileSdkVersion 33
//    buildToolsVersion "30.0.2"

    defaultConfig {
        applicationId "com.example.myapp"
        minSdk 26
        targetSdkVersion 31
        versionCode 1
        versionName "1.0"

        javaCompileOptions {
            annotationProcessorOptions {
                arguments = ["room.schemaLocation": "$projectDir/schemas".toString()]
            }
        }

        testInstrumentationRunner "androidx.test.runner.AndroidJUnitRunner"
        renderscriptTargetApi 25
        renderscriptSupportModeEnabled true
    }

    buildTypes {
        release {
            minifyEnabled false
            proguardFiles getDefaultProguardFile('proguard-android-optimize.txt'), 'proguard-rules.pro'
            applicationVariants.all { variant ->
                variant.outputs.all {
                    String s = new Date().format('dd_MM_YYYY')
                    outputFileName = "myapp_${variant.buildType.name}_${s}.apk"
                }
            }
        }
    }
    compileOptions {
        sourceCompatibility JavaVersion.VERSION_1_8
        targetCompatibility JavaVersion.VERSION_1_8
    }
    flavorDimensions 'env'
    productFlavors {
        backendTest {
            dimension 'env'
        }
    }

    sourceSets {
        backendTest.java.srcDirs += "src/backendTest/java"
    }
}

dependencies {
    def room_version = "2.4.2"
    def retrofit_version = "2.4.0"

    implementation 'androidx.appcompat:appcompat:1.2.0'
    implementation "com.squareup.retrofit2:retrofit:$retrofit_version"
    implementation 'com.google.android.material:material:1.3.0'
    implementation 'androidx.constraintlayout:constraintlayout:2.1.4'
    implementation 'androidx.lifecycle:lifecycle-extensions:2.2.0'

    implementation "androidx.room:room-runtime:$room_version"
    implementation "androidx.room:room-rxjava2:$room_version"
    implementation "androidx.room:room-guava:$room_version"

    implementation 'no.nordicsemi.android:mesh:3.3.4'

    testImplementation 'junit:junit:4.13.2'
    androidTestImplementation 'androidx.test.ext:junit:1.1.2'
    androidTestImplementation 'androidx.test.espresso:espresso-core:3.3.0'
    implementation 'androidx.lifecycle:lifecycle-livedata-ktx:2.3.0'
    implementation 'androidx.lifecycle:lifecycle-viewmodel-ktx:2.3.0'
    implementation 'androidx.preference:preference:1.1.1'
    implementation 'androidx.legacy:legacy-support-v4:1.0.0'
    implementation 'androidx.navigation:navigation-fragment:2.3.5'
    implementation 'androidx.navigation:navigation-ui:2.3.5'
    implementation 'com.balysv:material-ripple:1.0.2'
    implementation 'com.ms-square:etsyblur:0.2.1'
    //implementation 'agency.tango.android:material-intro-screen:0.0.4'   //0.0.5 version not working
    implementation 'com.github.TangoAgency:material-intro-screen:0.0.5'
    //implementation 'com.elconfidencial.bubbleshowcase:bubbleshowcase:1.3.1'
    implementation 'com.x5dev:chunk-templates:3.6.1'
    implementation 'info.hoang8f:android-segmented:1.0.6'

    implementation "com.squareup.retrofit2:converter-gson:$retrofit_version"
    annotationProcessor "androidx.room:room-compiler:$room_version"

    implementation project(':custommodule')

    implementation 'com.github.bumptech.glide:glide:4.13.2'
    annotationProcessor 'com.github.bumptech.glide:compiler:4.13.2'

    implementation 'com.vanniktech:android-image-cropper:4.5.0'
    implementation fileTree(dir: 'libs', include: ['*.jar'])
}

I have attempted to update my build files but nothing seems to resolve the issue. I am new to Java app development and to the app I'm working on itself. I am totally stumped so any advice would be greatly appreciated.

question_comments.body: Try updating all your dependencies first. Your Room version is way behind.
